title: "You must be lvl 7 or higher to create a discussion"
body: Im Level 30 .... and have been for weeks.

replies.body: Having a similar issue here myself except I am level 7. I am posting this message on the boards to try and help synch the boards with my game profile.
It takes a few minutes after signing into the boards to get updated to Level 30 on them. You will see that you are now Level 30, you should be able to post elsewhere now.
